thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 6 of 660
thread.title: Victor R Ortiz
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Victor R Ortiz

author: Victor R Ortiz
title: Victor R Ortiz
text:
Generally great service and I love the frames. A couple of suggestions:
1. Between the website and emails and customer service, there were a variety of discounts available, but it was not clear they were mutually exclusive, which leads customers like me to feel there is a bit of bait and switch going on that can erode trust.
2. Turned out the frames I ordered were on back order. Your CS reps should have data on inventory. I might have chosen another color.
3. Frame fitting and pupil location, especially for multifocal lenses, may need some adjustment. Costco was able to give me correct measurements when the photo with a CD method failed.
4. Your CS reps seem great and I really appreciated the expedited lens install and shipment once the frames were available, and the care I am now getting to have the lenses remade correctly.
